name: Meridian_Gramercy_Reclining_Sofa_with_Plush_Pillow_Arms
reviews: it's really very awesome sofa. Size is pretty big and I loved it.
description: The Reclining Motion Living Room Set in Bonded Leather  by Meridian Furniture is the perfect sanctuary. Made to give you the ultimate comfort and relaxation you deserve. Features duel reclining sofa & loveseat as well as a drop down console in the sofa. You can customize any combination of pieces to best suit your needs. Removable backs for easy doorway access.
